text: Rafael Batatinha dos Santos (born 9 February 1990 in Senhor do Bonfim, Bahia), known as Batatinha, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays for Portuguese club Grupo Sportivo Loures as a forward. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Esporte Clube Bahia players Category:Futebol Clube Cascavel players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:LigaPro players Category:Portuguese Second Division players Category:Anadia F.C. players Category:C.D. title: Rafael Batatinha
